title: New midlane item: The Botlane Leash
body:
Are you tired of your mid opponent walking bot, and despite your frantic pings they still stay at enemy tower, giving the enemy Zed a free double when they could have just backed off? Then this new item might be for you!

NEW ITEM: The Botlane Leash
COST: 42 gold
STATS: None
ACTIVE: Creates a tether between bot tower and your ADC/support, which pulls the ADC/support towards their own botlane tower, and prevents them from going outside turret range. If this successfully prevents a roam, *steal* 5 AD from your AD carry, and convert it into 5 AD or 8 AP, **adaptive**. 
Activate again to cut the leash.

When this item is sold, the stolen AD is returned to the AD carry.

---
This item would single handedly improve mages' winrate more than all Ritos nerfs combined.
